summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless for help with their account and was looking for a new phone and accessories. The agent was able to provide the customer with information about the different phones, tablets, and other devices that Contoso Wireless offers, as well as a selection of accessories for iPhones. The agent also offered to send the customer links to check out their selection of wireless charging pads. The customer thanked the agent and the conversation ended with the agent offering further assistance if needed.
